name: Orphan
tagline: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she claims to be.

name: Bandits
tagline: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.

name: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
tagline: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken total control over the building of a media mogul.

name: The Great Outdoors
tagline: A Chicago man's hope for a peaceful family vacation in the woods is shattered when the annoying in-laws drop in.

name: Secondhand Lions
tagline: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.

name: Pale Rider
tagline: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

name: Peggy Sue Got Married
tagline: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

name: Gosford Park
tagline: Multiple storylined drama set in 1932, showing the lives of upstairs guest and downstairs servants at a party in a country house in England.

name: The Peacemaker
tagline: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

name: A Walk to Remember
tagline: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

name: Private Parts
tagline: The auto-biographical story of Howard Stern, the radio-rebel who is now also a TV-personality, an author and a movie star.

name: What to Expect When You're Expecting
tagline: A look at love through the eyes of five interconnected couples experiencing the thrills and surprises of having a baby, and ultimately coming to understand the universal truth that no matter what you plan for, life doesn't always deliver what's expected.

name: Money Talks
tagline: Sought by police and criminals, a small-time huckster makes a deal with a TV newsman for protection.

name: Orange County
tagline: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

name: John Tucker Must Die
tagline: Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.

name: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
tagline: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

name: The Last Exorcism
tagline: A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.

name: End of Watch
tagline: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

name: The Ides of March
tagline: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

name: Rocky V
tagline: Reluctantly retired from boxing and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him; As the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.

name: The Siege
tagline: The secret US abduction of a suspected terrorist leads to a wave of terrorist attacks in New York that lead to the declaration of martial law.

name: Windtalkers
tagline: Two U.S. Marines in WWII are assigned to protect Navajo Marines who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

name: Out of Time
tagline: A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.

name: Falling Down
tagline: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

name: Pee-wee's Big Adventure
tagline: When eccentric man-child Pee-Wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

name: Revenge of the Nerds
tagline: At a big campus, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self respect.

name: House on Haunted Hill
tagline: A millionaire offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

name: Absence of Malice
tagline: When a prosecutor leaks a false story that a liquor warehouse owner is involved in the murder of an union head, the man's life begins to unravel.

name: Short Circuit
tagline: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

name: Encino Man
tagline: When they find a frozen cave-man in their back yard, two high-school outcasts thaw him and introduce him to modern life while he in turn gets them to actually enjoy life.

name: Max Payne
tagline: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective whose family was slain as part of a conspiracy and an assassin out to avenge her sister's death. The duo will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

name: Pleasantville
tagline: Two 1990s teenagers find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

name: About a Boy
tagline: Based on Nick Hornby's best-selling novel, About A Boy is the story of a cynical, immature young man who is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy

name: Duplicity
tagline: A pair of corporate spies who share a steamy past hook up to pull off the ultimate con job on their respective bosses.

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
tagline: Two seemingly dumb teens struggle to prepare a historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

name: Pretty in Pink
tagline: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.

name: The Water Horse
tagline: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

name: The Master of Disguise
tagline: An Italian waiter fights off a criminal mastermind with his inherited powers of disguise.

name: Swiss Family Robinson
tagline: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

name: Heartbreakers
tagline: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.

name: I Am Sam
tagline: A mentally retarded man fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his cold-hearted lawyer the value of love and family.

name: Hanna
tagline: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

name: Hard Ball
tagline: An aimless young man who is scalping tickets, gambling and drinking, agrees to coach a Little League team from the Cabrini Green housing project in Chicago as a condition of getting a loan from a friend.

name: There Will Be Blood
tagline: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

name: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
tagline: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she's dreamed of having.

name: Catwoman
tagline: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

name: Legion
tagline: A group of strangers fight for the welfare of humanity.

name: The Piano
tagline: A mute woman along with her young daughter, and her prized piano, are sent to 1850s New Zealand for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, and she's soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

name: Stranger Than Fiction
tagline: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

name: Blue Crush
tagline: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

name: Hannah and Her Sisters

production.name: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions

tagline: Between two Thanksgivings, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

name: Righteous Kill
tagline: Two veteran New York City detectives work on a case of serial executions of criminals who escaped justice.

name: You Got Served
tagline: In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.

name: The Faculty
tagline: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurances.

name: Roxanne
tagline: Based on the play "Cyrano de Bergerac", large nosed C.D. Bales falls for the beautiful Roxanne while she falls for his personality but another man's looks.

name: Collateral Damage
tagline: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

name: A Haunted House
tagline: Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home, but soon learn a demon also resides there. When Kisha becomes possessed, Malcolm - determined to keep his sex life on track - turns to a priest, a psychic, and a team of ghost-busters for help.

name: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
tagline: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

name: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
tagline: Eliza and Debbie are two sisters who don't always get along. But their relationship is put to the test when Debbie's life is in danger, and Eliza might have to give up her power to talk to animals....

name: The Illusionist
tagline: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

name: Caddyshack
tagline: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

name: The Beach
tagline: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

name: Epic Movie
tagline: A comedic satire of films that are large in scope, reputation and popularity

name: The Ladykillers
tagline: An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a band in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting landlord: a sharp old woman.

name: Hitman
tagline: A gun-for-hire known only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as 'The Organization' is ensnared in a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Russia and Eastern Europe.

name: The Exorcist
tagline: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

name: Jackie Brown
tagline: A flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

name: 30 Days of Night
tagline: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.

name: Benji
tagline: A stray dog saves two kidnapped children.

name: Resident Evil
tagline: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

name: Hocus Pocus
tagline: After three centuries, three witch sisters are resurrected in Salem Massachusetts on Halloween night, and it is up to two teen-agers, a young girl, and an immortal cat to put an end to the witches' reign of terror once and for all.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
tagline: On one last road trip before they're sent to serve in Vietnam, two brothers and their girlfriends get into an accident that calls their local sheriff to the scene. Thus begins a terrifying experience where the teens are taken to a secluded house of horrors, where a young, would-be killer is being nurtured.

name: Crazy Heart
tagline: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

name: Little Nicky
tagline: A movie about the independent minded son of Beelzebub and the mischief he creates.

name: Burlesque
tagline: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

name: Joe Versus the Volcano
tagline: When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.

name: Rugrats Go Wild
tagline: The Rugrats get tangled in an exotic adventure, where they're helped by the Thornberrys, a family that travels the world making nature documentaries.

name: Body of Lies
tagline: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordon Intelligence.

name: Lakeview Terrace
tagline: A LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out the interracial couple who just moved in next door.

name: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
Anna and the King
tagline: The story of the romance between the King of Siam and the widowed British schoolteacher Anna Leonowens during the 1860's.

name: ¡Three Amigos!
tagline: Three unemployed actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to replay their bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

name: Pitch Black
tagline: A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.

name: Annie Hall
tagline: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.

name: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl 3-D
tagline: A boy dreams up shark-boy and lava-girl and the horror that lies within their planet.

name: Enough
tagline: On the run from an abusive husband, a young mother begins to train herself to fight back.

name: The Grudge 2
tagline: In Tokyo, a young woman (Tamblyn) is exposed to the same mysterious curse that afflicted her sister (Gellar). The supernatural force, which fills a person with rage before spreading to its next victim, brings together a group of previously unrelated people who attempt to unlock its secret to save their lives.
